tasks.title: Bütün Məlumatları Seçmək
tasks.initialCode:
-- Kodunuzu buraya yazın
SELECT * FROM employees;

tests.input:
employees cədvəli: id, name, salary
Dəyərlər: (1, 'Ali', 1000), (2, 'Aysel', 1500)

tasks.solution: SELECT * FROM employees;

tasks.title: WHERE Şərti
tasks.solution: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary > 1000;

tasks.title: ORDER BY Sıralama
tasks.description: İşçiləri maaşa görə azalan sıra ilə sıralayın

tests.expected:
id | name   | salary
2  | Aysel  | 1200
3  | Mehmet | 950
1  | Ali    | 800
tests.description: Maaşa görə azalan sıra ilə sıralanmalıdır

tasks.solution: SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC;

tasks.title: COUNT Funksiyası
tasks.solution: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees;

tasks.title: GROUP BY
tasks.description: Hər departament üzrə orta maaşı hesablayın
tasks.solution: SELECT department, AVG(salary) as avg_salary FROM employees GROUP BY department;

tasks.title: JOIN əməliyyatı

tests.expected:
id | name  | department_name
1  | Ali   | IT
2  | Aysel | HR

tasks.solution: SELECT e.id, e.name, d.name as department_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department_id = d.id;

tasks.title: LIKE operatoru
tasks.solution: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE name LIKE 'A%';

tasks.title: IN operatoru

tests.expected:
id | name   | city
1  | Ali    | Baku
3  | Mehmet | Baku
tests.description: Yalnız Baku və Sumqayit şəhərlərində olanları göstərməlidir

tasks.solution: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE city IN ('Baku', 'Sumqayit');

tasks.title: BETWEEN operatoru
tasks.description: Maaşı 800 ilə 1000 arasında olan işçiləri tapın
tasks.solution: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary BETWEEN 800 AND 1000;

tasks.title: DISTINCT
tasks.solution: SELECT DISTINCT city FROM employees;

tasks.title: SUM funksiyası
tasks.solution: SELECT SUM(salary) FROM employees;

tasks.title: MAX funksiyası
tasks.solution: SELECT MAX(salary) FROM employees;

tasks.title: MIN funksiyası
tasks.solution: SELECT MIN(salary) FROM employees;

tasks.title: AVG funksiyası
tasks.solution: SELECT AVG(salary) FROM employees;

tasks.title: HAVING şərti
tasks.description: Orta maaşı 900-dən çox olan departamentləri tapın

tests.description: Yalnız orta maaşı 900-dən yuxarı olan departamentləri göstərməlidir

tasks.solution: SELECT department, AVG(salary) as avg_salary FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING AVG(salary) > 900;

tasks.title: Subquery
tasks.description: Orta maaşdan yuxarı maaş alan işçiləri tapın

tests.description: Yalnız orta maaşdan yuxarı alanları göstərməlidir

tasks.solution: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary > (SELECT AVG(salary) FROM employees);

tasks.title: UPDATE əməliyyatı
tasks.solution: UPDATE employees SET salary = salary * 1.1 WHERE department = 'IT';

tasks.title: DELETE əməliyyatı
tasks.solution: DELETE FROM employees WHERE salary < 500;

tasks.title: INSERT əməliyyatı
tasks.solution: INSERT INTO employees (id, name, salary, department) VALUES (4, 'Nermin', 1100, 'Finance');

tasks.title: CREATE TABLE
tasks.solution: CREATE TABLE products (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), price DECIMAL(10,2), category VARCHAR(50));

tasks.title: ALTER TABLE
tasks.solution: ALTER TABLE employees ADD COLUMN email VARCHAR(100);

tasks.title: DROP TABLE
tasks.solution: DROP TABLE temp_data;

tasks.title: TRUNCATE TABLE
tasks.solution: TRUNCATE TABLE logs;

tasks.title: CASE ifadəsi

tests.expected:
name  | category
Ali   | Orta
Aysel | Yüksək
Mehmet| Çox yüksək

tasks.solution: SELECT name, CASE WHEN salary < 1000 THEN 'Orta' WHEN salary < 1500 THEN 'Yüksək' ELSE 'Çox yüksək' END as category FROM employees;

tasks.title: COALESCE funksiyası
tasks.solution: SELECT name, COALESCE(salary, 0) as salary FROM employees;

tasks.title: CONCAT funksiyası
tasks.solution: SELECT CONCAT(name, ' ', surname) as full_name FROM employees;

tasks.title: DATE funksiyaları
tasks.description: Bu günün tarixini və 30 gün sonranı hesablayın

tests.description: Cari tarixi və 30 gün sonranı göstərməlidir

tasks.solution: SELECT CURDATE() as today, DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) as next_month;

tasks.title: LIMIT
tasks.solution: SELECT * FROM employees LIMIT 5;

tasks.title: OFFSET
tasks.solution: SELECT * FROM employees LIMIT 5 OFFSET 5;

tasks.title: UNION
tasks.solution: SELECT id, name FROM current_employees UNION SELECT id, name FROM past_employees;

tasks.title: EXISTS
tasks.solution: SELECT * FROM customers c WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM orders o WHERE o.customer_id = c.id);

tasks.title: NOT NULL constraint
tasks.solution: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE email IS NOT NULL;

tasks.title: FOREIGN KEY

tests.description: Foreign key istifadə edərək JOIN etməlidir

tasks.solution: SELECT e.name, d.department_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department_id = d.id;

tasks.title: VIEW yaratmaq
tasks.description: Yüksək maaşlı işçilər üçün view yaradın

tests.description: Maaşı 1000-dən yuxarı olanlar üçün view yaratmalıdır

tasks.solution: CREATE VIEW high_salary_employees AS SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary > 1000;

tasks.title: INDEX yaratmaq
tasks.solution: CREATE INDEX idx_employee_name ON employees(name);

tasks.title: STRING funksiyaları
tasks.solution: SELECT name, LENGTH(name) as length FROM employees;

tasks.title: ROUND funksiyası
tasks.solution: SELECT ROUND(AVG(salary)) as avg_salary FROM employees;

tasks.title: NULLIF funksiyası
tasks.solution: SELECT id, NULLIF(amount, 0) as amount FROM sales;

tasks.title: WINDOW funksiyası

tests.expected:
name   | salary | rank
Aysel  | 1200   | 1
Mehmet | 950    | 2
Ali    | 800    | 3

tasks.solution: SELECT name, salary, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY salary DESC) as rank FROM employees;

tasks.title: TRIGGER yaratmaq
tasks.description: İşçi əlavə edildikdə log yazan trigger yaradın

tests.input: employees cədvəlinə yeni işçi əlavə edilir

tasks.solution: CREATE TRIGGER after_employee_insert AFTER INSERT ON employees FOR EACH ROW INSERT INTO employee_logs (employee_id, action, timestamp) VALUES (NEW.id, 'INSERTED', NOW());
